jobInfo.jobName: 嵌入式软件测开工程师
jobInfo.postDescription:
教育背景：
电子信息技术、计算机、通信等相关专业，
本科及以上学历

英语要求：
可以作为工作语言

专业技能要求：
熟练掌握C及C++
了解CAN LIN 等相关知识的优先考虑；
熟练掌握嵌入式软件开发工具的优先考虑；

工作职责：

工作内容主要分为三部分，
1. 单片机相关的功能测试，黑盒测试等
2. 代码类白盒测试
3. 工具类开发

-	编写技术规范、测试用例及测试计划
-	基于软件需求，执行软件功能测试
-	执行单元测试、软件集成测试并支持系统集成测试
-	支持软件开发工程师复制、分析、调试软件问题
-	遵循公司内部PSP流程，确保软件测试流程满足ASPICE 3级要求
-	文件归档和代码评审；

Educational Background
-	Electrical Information technology, Computer, Communication or related profession bachelor degree.

Technical Skills
-	Key skills: ability to work autonomously in an international environment creativity, team spirit and a pro-active attitude are imperative
-	Excellent communication skills
-	Strong C or C++ programming experience
-	Good understanding of the SW requirement, and good skill for test design.
-	Good work habit to follow the company standard process.
-	Knowledge of micro-controller hardware and peripherals
-	Knowledge of automotive networks (CAN, LIN, K-Line) is considered an advantage
-	Experience in embedded software development tools is considered an advantage
-	Experience in Lab/Windows / VC++ / VB is considered as an advantage
-	Fluent English is a must

Language Skills
-	College English Test Band 4 (CET 4)
-	College English Test Band 6(CET 6) preferred

Soft Skill
-	Ability to work autonomously in an international environment creativity, team spirit and a pro-active attitude are imperative
-	Good self-study ability
-	Good communication skill
-	Organizational and leadership skills are a plus
Essential responsibilities
-	Development of specifications, test cases and validation plans
-	Conduct SW functional test based on SW requirement.
-	Conduct module tests and software integration tests and support system integration tests.
-	Support SW developer reproduce, analysis and debug the SW issue.
-	Follow the PSP process to make sure SW validation procedure can meet ASPICE level 3.( Automotive Software Process Improvement and Capacity Determination）
-	Conduct document and code reviews
jobInfo.address: 北京丰台区海鹰路6号院2层201
showSkills: 嵌入式/单片机开发经验

brandComInfo.introduce:
IEE集团公司总部位于欧洲卢森堡，控股公司为央企航天科技控股集团股份有限公司。集团公司分布在欧洲，亚洲，美国和墨西哥。
中国区生产基地位于河北廊坊经济技术开发区，人员规模500人左右，包括生产车间、物流、行政人事财务等人员，北京技术服务分公司位于丰台区海鹰路6号院2号楼2层，人员规模40人左右，涵盖研发、销售及工程项目人员，公司主营产品为汽车电子传感器。
